page.title: 26Additional update
page.content:
Over the years the demographic has changed. Residents travel much further than 10 miles to work and this has increased the number of cars in the village.

In addition the High Street has become a thoroughfare for traffic between the A1M and the M1 motorways, making the village a noiser place. Increase in air traffic from Luton Airpost has added to this.
S.L.Ryder
